channel.title: Posts on Energy data analysis in rmardown
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Energy data analysis in rmardown

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Running Days - 2018
item.description: library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Natural gas combine cycle plant generation depends upon market demand . Attemp has been made to calculate the number of days plant was supplying power to grid.It is a first attempt for a comparitive study with counting wind generating days G18<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2018.xlsx") G18$Date <- as.Date(G18$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Dz_18Total<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2018_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) Dz_18Goreway<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2018_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY-G11`+ `SITHE GOREWAY-G12`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G13`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G15`),n=n()) Dz_18Halton<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Halton_2018_Total=sum(`HALTONHILLS-LT_G1`+`HALTONHILLS-LT_G2`+`HALTONHILLS-LT_G3`),n=n()) Dz_18Portland<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Portlands_2018_Total=sum(`PORTLANDS-G1`+`PORTLANDS-G2`+`PORTLANDS-G3`),n=n()) Dz_18Greenfeild<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(GEC_2018_Total=sum(`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G1`+ `GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G2`+`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G3`+`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G4`),n=n()) Dz_18Brighton<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Brigton_2018_Total=sum(`BRIGHTON BEACH`),n=n()) head(Dz_18Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2018_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2018-01-01 472749 24 ## 2 2018-01-02 501524 24 ## 3 2018-01-03 488861 24 ## 4 2018-01-04 476718 24 ## 5 2018-01-05 498172 24 ## 6 2018-01-06 507839 24 Dz_18GB<-cbind(Dz_18Total[,-3],Dz_18Goreway[,2],Dz_18Halton[,2],Dz_18Portland[,2],Dz_18Greenfeild[,2],Dz_18Brighton[,2]) head(Dz_18GB) ## Date Total_2018_Gen Goreway_2018_Total Halton_2018_Total ## 1 2018-01-01 472749 0 5417 ## 2 2018-01-02 501524 0 5074 ## 3 2018-01-03 488861 5390 7553 ## 4 2018-01-04 476718 5185 8640 ## 5 2018-01-05 498172 1401 7978 ## 6 2018-01-06 507839 5002 12571 ## Portlands_2018_Total GEC_2018_Total Brigton_2018_Total ## 1 2935 8712 3471 ## 2 4299 8041 5789 ## 3 3312 8696 7030 ## 4 4147 12261 7168 ## 5 8779 376 8929 ## 6 11858 16826 6290 Checking for missing values

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Generation vs Total - 2018
item.description: Gas_5 1.Goreway Power Station 2.Halton Hills Combined Cycle Plant 3.Portlands Energy Centre 4.Greenfield Energy Centre 5.Brighton Beach Generating Station Year 2018 library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Date Format G18<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2018.xlsx") G18$Date <- as.Date(G18$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Total Generation Dz_18Total<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2018_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) head(Dz_18Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2018_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2018-01-01 472749 24 ## 2 2018-01-02 501524 24 ## 3 2018-01-03 488861 24 ## 4 2018-01-04 476718 24 ## 5 2018-01-05 498172 24 ## 6 2018-01-06 507839 24 x<-(Dz_18Total$Total_2018_Gen) y<- density(Dz_18Total$Total_2018_Gen) plot(y, main="Total 2018 Gen density during the year in MW") polygon(y, col="red", border="blue") Goreway Power Station Dz_18Goreway<-G18 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2018_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY-G11`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G12`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G13`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G15`),n=n()) head(Dz_18Goreway) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Goreway_2018_Total n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2018-01-01 0 24 ## 2 2018-01-02 0 24 ## 3 2018-01-03 5390 24 ## 4 2018-01-04 5185 24 ## 5 2018-01-05 1401 24 ## 6 2018-01-06 5002 24 summary(Dz_18Goreway) ## Date Goreway_2018_Total n ## Min.

item.title: Ontario Energy Data Analysis - 2018
item.description: Ontario Energy Data Analysis - 2018 Data Collection Library used during analysis Ontario Demand Ontario Generation Date Format and Summary Function Daily average generation Ontario HOEP (Hour Ontario Electricity Price) Ontario Natural Gas Price US($) Temperature Data Preparation Round digits to two decimal Filling NA with mean values Combine monthly temperaure( rbind) Data Preparation Checking Missing Values Filling Missing Values Converting the Column data into single row ( Using gather) Converting Blank cell with NA.

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Running Days - 2017
item.description: library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Natural gas combine cycle plant generation depends upon market demand . Attemp has been made to calculate the number of days plant was supplying power to grid.It is a first attempt for a comparitive study with counting wind generating days G17<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2017.xlsx") G17$Date <- as.Date(G17$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Dz_17Total<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2017_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) Dz_17Goreway<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2017_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY-G11`+ `SITHE GOREWAY-G12`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G13`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G15`),n=n()) Dz_17Halton<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Halton_2017_Total=sum(`HALTONHILLS-LT_G1`+`HALTONHILLS-LT_G2`+`HALTONHILLS-LT_G3`),n=n()) Dz_17Portland<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Portlands_2017_Total=sum(`PORTLANDS-G1`+`PORTLANDS-G2`+`PORTLANDS-G3`),n=n()) Dz_17Greenfeild<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(GEC_2017_Total=sum(`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G1`+ `GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G2`+`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G3`+`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G4`),n=n()) Dz_17Brighton<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Brigton_2017_Total=sum(`BRIGHTON BEACH`),n=n()) head(Dz_17Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2017_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2017-01-01 395129 24 ## 2 2017-01-02 400509 24 ## 3 2017-01-03 410456 24 ## 4 2017-01-04 444225 24 ## 5 2017-01-05 450843 24 ## 6 2017-01-06 447011 24 Dz_17GB<-cbind(Dz_17Total[,-3],Dz_17Goreway[,2],Dz_17Halton[,2],Dz_17Portland[,2],Dz_17Greenfeild[,2],Dz_17Brighton[,2]) head(Dz_17GB) ## Date Total_2017_Gen Goreway_2017_Total Halton_2017_Total ## 1 2017-01-01 395129 0 0 ## 2 2017-01-02 400509 0 0 ## 3 2017-01-03 410456 0 0 ## 4 2017-01-04 444225 0 0 ## 5 2017-01-05 450843 0 6762 ## 6 2017-01-06 447011 0 7965 ## Portlands_2017_Total GEC_2017_Total Brigton_2017_Total ## 1 0 0 0 ## 2 0 0 0 ## 3 1435 0 0 ## 4 0 85 0 ## 5 1358 155 0 ## 6 2494 8816 6361 Checking for missing values

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Generation vs Total - 2017
item.description: Gas_5 1.Goreway Power Station 2.Halton Hills Combined Cycle Plant 3.Portlands Energy Centre 4.Greenfield Energy Centre 5.Brighton Beach Generating Station Year 2017 library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Date Format G17<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2017.xlsx") G17$Date <- as.Date(G17$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Total Generation Dz_17Total<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2017_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) head(Dz_17Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2017_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2017-01-01 395129 24 ## 2 2017-01-02 400509 24 ## 3 2017-01-03 410456 24 ## 4 2017-01-04 444225 24 ## 5 2017-01-05 450843 24 ## 6 2017-01-06 447011 24 x<-(Dz_17Total$Total_2017_Gen) y<- density(Dz_17Total$Total_2017_Gen) plot(y, main="Total 2017 Gen density during the year in MW") polygon(y, col="red", border="blue") Goreway Power Station Dz_17Goreway<-G17 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2017_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY-G11`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G12`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G13`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G15`),n=n()) head(Dz_17Goreway) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Goreway_2017_Total n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2017-01-01 0 24 ## 2 2017-01-02 0 24 ## 3 2017-01-03 0 24 ## 4 2017-01-04 0 24 ## 5 2017-01-05 0 24 ## 6 2017-01-06 0 24 summary(Dz_17Goreway) ## Date Goreway_2017_Total n ## Min.

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Generation vs Total - 2016
item.description: Gas_5 1.Goreway Power Station 2.Halton Hills Combined Cycle Plant 3.Portlands Energy Centre 4.Greenfield Energy Centre 5.Brighton Beach Generating Station Year 2016 library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Date Format G16<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2016.xlsx") G16$Date <- as.Date(G16$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Total Generation Dz_16Total<-G16 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2016_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) head(Dz_16Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2016_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2016-01-01 414384 24 ## 2 2016-01-02 424701 24 ## 3 2016-01-03 429112 24 ## 4 2016-01-04 482858 24 ## 5 2016-01-05 495795 24 ## 6 2016-01-06 460060 24 x<-(Dz_16Total$Total_2016_Gen) y<- density(Dz_16Total$Total_2016_Gen) plot(y, main="Total 2016 Gen density during the year in MW") polygon(y, col="red", border="blue") Goreway Power Station Dz_16Goreway<-G16 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2016_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY-G11`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G12`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G13`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G15`),n=n()) head(Dz_16Goreway) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Goreway_2016_Total n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2016-01-01 0 24 ## 2 2016-01-02 0 24 ## 3 2016-01-03 2376 24 ## 4 2016-01-04 7144 24 ## 5 2016-01-05 7488 24 ## 6 2016-01-06 0 24 summary(Dz_16Goreway) ## Date Goreway_2016_Total n ## Min.

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Running Days - 2015
item.description: library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Natural gas combine cycle plant generation depends upon market demand . Attemp has been made to calculate the number of days plant was supplying power to grid.It is a first attempt for a comparitive study with counting wind generating days G15<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2015.xlsx") G15$Date <- as.Date(G15$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Dz_15Total<-G15 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2015_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) Dz_15Goreway<-G15 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2015_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY-G11`+ `SITHE GOREWAY-G12`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G13`+`SITHE GOREWAY-G15`),n=n()) Dz_15Halton<-G15 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Halton_2015_Total=sum(`HALTONHILLS-LT_G1`+`HALTONHILLS-LT_G2`+`HALTONHILLS-LT_G3`),n=n()) Dz_15Portland<-G15 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Portlands_2015_Total=sum(`PORTLANDS-G1`+`PORTLANDS-G2`+`PORTLANDS-G3`),n=n()) Dz_15Greenfeild<-G15 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(GEC_2015_Total=sum(`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G1`+ `GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G2`+`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G3`+`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE-G4`),n=n()) Dz_15Brighton<-G15 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Brigton_2015_Total=sum(`BRIGHTON BEACH`),n=n()) head(Dz_15Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2015_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2015-01-01 448872 24 ## 2 2015-01-02 451458 24 ## 3 2015-01-03 451553 24 ## 4 2015-01-04 445476 24 ## 5 2015-01-05 488123 24 ## 6 2015-01-06 506112 24 Dz_15GB<-cbind(Dz_15Total[,-3],Dz_15Goreway[,2],Dz_15Halton[,2],Dz_15Portland[,2],Dz_15Greenfeild[,2],Dz_15Brighton[,2]) head(Dz_15GB) ## Date Total_2015_Gen Goreway_2015_Total Halton_2015_Total ## 1 2015-01-01 448872 0 0 ## 2 2015-01-02 451458 3358 0 ## 3 2015-01-03 451553 3290 4141 ## 4 2015-01-04 445476 0 2926 ## 5 2015-01-05 488123 5658 6851 ## 6 2015-01-06 506112 11606 8105 ## Portlands_2015_Total GEC_2015_Total Brigton_2015_Total ## 1 1215 0 0 ## 2 3534 9794 0 ## 3 3712 0 0 ## 4 0 0 0 ## 5 3555 7747 0 ## 6 3188 14319 1806 Checking for missing values

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Running Days - 2014
item.description: library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Natural gas combine cycle plant generation depends upon market demand . Attemp has been made to calculate the number of days plant was supplying power to grid.It is a first attempt for a comparitive study with counting wind generating days G14<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2014.xlsx") G14$Date <- as.Date(G14$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Dz_14Total<-G14 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2014_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) Dz_14Goreway<-G14 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2014_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY`),n=n()) Dz_14Halton<-G14 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Halton_2014_Total=sum(HALTONHILLS),n=n()) Dz_14Portland<-G14 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Portlands_2014_Total=sum(PORTLANDS),n=n()) Dz_14Greenfeild<-G14 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(GEC_2014_Total=sum(`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE`),n=n()) Dz_14Brighton<-G14 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Brigton_2014_Total=sum(`BRIGHTON BEACH`),n=n()) head(Dz_14Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2014_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2014-01-01 440362 24 ## 2 2014-01-02 515174 24 ## 3 2014-01-03 529855 24 ## 4 2014-01-04 480374 24 ## 5 2014-01-05 424395 24 ## 6 2014-01-06 471441 24 Dz_14GB<-cbind(Dz_14Total[,-3],Dz_14Goreway[,2],Dz_14Halton[,2],Dz_14Portland[,2],Dz_14Greenfeild[,2],Dz_14Brighton[,2]) head(Dz_14GB) ## Date Total_2014_Gen Goreway_2014_Total Halton_2014_Total ## 1 2014-01-01 440362 3114 3056 ## 2 2014-01-02 515174 15335 12791 ## 3 2014-01-03 529855 18671 17080 ## 4 2014-01-04 480374 11042 9120 ## 5 2014-01-05 424395 5903 7052 ## 6 2014-01-06 471441 5443 14522 ## Portlands_2014_Total GEC_2014_Total Brigton_2014_Total ## 1 2052 6464 0 ## 2 7465 15183 3067 ## 3 11493 19766 5626 ## 4 6476 8593 0 ## 5 2475 6196 0 ## 6 6034 9225 0 Checking for missing values

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Running Days - 2012
item.description: library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(plyr) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Natural gas combine cycle plant generation depends upon market demand . Attemp has been made to calculate the number of days plant was supplying power to grid.It is a first attempt for a comparitive study with counting wind generating days G12<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2012.xlsx") G12$DATE <- as.Date(G12$DATE, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format colnames(G12)[colnames(G12)=="DATE"] <- "Date" ##11$Date <- as.Date(G12$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Dz_12Total<-G12 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2012_Gen=sum(`TOTAL`),n=n()) Dz_12Goreway<-G12 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2012_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY`),n=n()) Dz_12Halton<-G12 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Halton_2012_Total=sum(HALTONHILLS),n=n()) Dz_12Portland<-G12 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Portlands_2012_Total=sum(PORTLANDS),n=n()) Dz_12Greenfeild<-G12 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(GEC_2012_Total=sum(`GREENFIELD ENERGY CENTRE`),n=n()) Dz_12Brighton<-G12 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Brigton_2012_Total=sum(`BRIGHTON BEACH`),n=n()) Dz_12GB<-cbind(Dz_12Total[,-3],Dz_12Goreway[,2],Dz_12Halton[,2],Dz_12Portland[,2],Dz_12Greenfeild[,2],Dz_12Brighton[,2]) Dz_12Goreway ## # A tibble: 366 x 3 ## Date Goreway_2012_Total n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2012-01-01 0 24 ## 2 2012-01-02 5645 24 ## 3 2012-01-03 16596 24 ## 4 2012-01-04 17918 24 ## 5 2012-01-05 8894 24 ## 6 2012-01-06 3618 24 ## 7 2012-01-07 0 24 ## 8 2012-01-08 0 24 ## 9 2012-01-09 4112 24 ## 10 2012-01-10 4057 24 ## # .
